ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Interventions Related to Medication Regimen, Change Medication Dosing Interval
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent instances when a provider intervenes to change a medication dosing interval, or frequency of dose, within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: InterventionThe intent of this data element is to document a drug therapy intervention to change a medication dosing interval, or frequency of dose, within a prescribed treatment regimen. These codes are documented separately from the explicit action taken place to execute an order within a system, and are used for intervention tracking,),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent an intervention has occurred to change a medication dosing interval, or frequency of dose, within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent a recommendation to intervene or explicit actions that are not specifically for changing a medication dosing interval, or frequency of dose, within a prescribed treatment regimen.)
